about_the_game:
The final challenge has arrived! 🔎🔥 

We live in a complex but beautiful world and this is what the final expansion is about. 

10 new handcrafted levels await the most challenging players looking for a zen experience amidst the chaos, be prepared as this is not an easy one. 

If you are ready to move forward with this DLC here are some things you should consider to maximize the experience and make things a little bit more relaxing.

  • “Every great journey starts with a single step.” Don’t rush to complete the full DLC in the same run.  💫😵

  • Remember you can Pan the camera view with these inputs: 

    • Keyboard: “Q” and “E” keys

    • Mouse: Press the scroll wheel and move left or right

    • Gamepad: Use R and L buttons 

  • There is no timer so take as much time as you want. 🐌

  • This DLC is meant to be more complex than everything you have played before (have that in mind).

Are you able to recognize some of the places that we reference in this DLC?

Thank you so much for being on our journey for Tiny Lands 1 these last 4 years!

Enjoy the final expansion!

name: Tiny Lands - The Final Challenge

subs.option_text: Tiny Lands - The Final Challenge - $1.99 $1.49 USD

package_groups.title: Buy Tiny Lands - The Final Challenge

short_description: Take your perceptivity to a new dimension in a relaxing low-poly isometric puzzle game. Find the differences in the beautiful, fully rotatable, and zoomable 3D environments. Can you find them all?
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Spanish - Latin America, Japanese, Russian, French, Italian, German, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil
